titleStmt.title: Three horoscopes for A.D. 150, 183, and undated

revisionDesc.change: Submit - Added Oxyrhynchite and Oxyrhynchos geo refs
Submit - Added Oxyrhynchite and Oxyrhynchos geo refs
Finalized - Updated provenance and added georefs for Trismegistos and Pleiades; added biblio for P.Oxy. 61.
Finalized - Updated provenance and added georefs for Trismegistos and Pleiades; added biblio for P.Oxy. 61.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Metadata: Add biblio 15610, no. 4240; religion = classical. Add geo ref https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983 and www.trismegistos.org/place/1524. Text: l. 1: underdots on all letters. line 2 and 3, overstrokes above numbers. Line 4: add Σκορπίῳ in lacuna. Line 6: add acute over upsilon in Taurw. Line 10: --> 10. γ̣[ένεσ]ι̣[ς] Σ̣αραπο̣ῦ̣το̣[ς]. Line 12: --> Καίσαρ̣[ος]. Line 13: --> Π̣[α]ῦ̣ν̣ι̣ <#.1̅[.1̅]=#> ὥ̣ρ̣(ᾳ) [.?]. Line 15, 16: --> [.?] at end of line. Lines 1 and 16: lost.?lin

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Metadata: Add biblio 15610, no. 4240; religion = classical. Add geo ref https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983 and www.trismegistos.org/place/1524. Text: l. 1: underdots on all letters. line 2 and 3, overstrokes above numbers. Line 4: add Σκορπίῳ in lacuna. Line 6: add acute over upsilon in Taurw. Line 10: --> 10. γ̣[ένεσ]ι̣[ς] Σ̣αραπο̣ῦ̣το̣[ς]. Line 12: --> Καίσαρ̣[ος]. Line 13: --> Π̣[α]ῦ̣ν̣ι̣ <#.1̅[.1̅]=#> ὥ̣ρ̣(ᾳ) [.?]. Line 15, 16: --> [.?] at end of line. Lines 1 and 16: lost.?lin
